pcie_compatibility.version_backward_compatibility: All PCIe versions are backward compatible
pcie_compatibility.lane_compatibility: Cards can use fewer lanes than slot provides
pcie_compatibility.electrical_vs_mechanical: x8 electrical cards can fit in x16 mechanical slots
pcie_compatibility.additional_power: High-power cards require auxiliary power connectors

memory_requirements.high_performance_nic: Minimum 16GB system RAM with ECC preferred
memory_requirements.gpu_acceleration: Minimum 64GB system RAM for AI/ML workloads
memory_requirements.storage_controller: Minimum 16GB system RAM for optimal cache performance

bios_firmware_requirements.legacy_support: Older cards may require Legacy BIOS mode
bios_firmware_requirements.secure_boot: Enterprise cards typically support Secure Boot
bios_firmware_requirements.resizable_bar: Modern GPUs benefit from Resizable BAR support
bios_firmware_requirements.above_4g_decoding: Required for high-memory GPUs and multiple GPU setups

cooling_power_considerations.case_airflow: High-performance cards require adequate case ventilation
cooling_power_considerations.psu_requirements: Calculate total system power including all expansion cards
cooling_power_considerations.thermal_throttling: Cards will throttle if cooling is inadequate
cooling_power_considerations.slot_spacing: Multi-slot cards may block adjacent slots
